individual_metadata.synopsis: Companion Halsin gives the bonded avatar a second warning that he disapproves of their actions. If they continue this course, he will soon leave the party permanently.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Continue to lower Halsin's approval rating for the avatar after his first warning (exact means of lowering approval TBD).

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Enough. I put my faith in you - thought you someone worth following. Do not make a fool of me.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: I had hoped you would change your ways, after I last spoke to you - but no.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: If you continue this course, I cannot remain by your side. I'm sorry I need to say this, but there will not be another warning.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: We had the beginning of something special, you and I... but no more. You didn't change your ways, even when I warned you.
2.context: NodeContext: Regretful/disappointed. Breaking up with someone after they began to act in a way she disapproves of
